articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Pádraig Harrington says American fans will put pressure on US Ryder Cup team - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘The home captain has to deal with stress,’ said the European captain, Pádraig Harrington, before the 2021 Ryder Cup at Whistling Straits
articles.content:
Pádraig Harrington, Europes captain, has claimed the US team will need to deal with the pressure and stress of being heavy favourites to reclaim the Ryder Cup in front of a partisan crowd.
